name: v0.6.6
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
# See examples/basicapp/MODULE.bazel.
bazel_dep(name = "rules_android", version = "0.6.6")
remote_android_extensions = use_extension(
    "@rules_android//bzlmod_extensions:android_extensions.bzl",
    "remote_android_tools_extensions")
use_repo(remote_android_extensions, "android_tools")

android_sdk_repository_extension = use_extension("@rules_android//rules/android_sdk_repository:rule.bzl", "android_sdk_repository_extension")
use_repo(android_sdk_repository_extension, "androidsdk")

register_toolchains("@androidsdk//:sdk-toolchain", "@androidsdk//:all")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_android",
    sha256 = "f8f8bca6df61ea6070a0a8abc4054940b19c9fdb4fabb864e40d29d124f517f9",
    strip_prefix = "rules_android-0.6.6",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/releases/download/v0.6.6/rules_android-v0.6.6.tar.gz",
)

# Android rules dependencies
load("@rules_android//:prereqs.bzl", "rules_android_prereqs")
rules_android_prereqs()

##### rules_java setup for rules_android #####
load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")
rules_java_dependencies()

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")
bazel_features_deps()

# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility
proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")
# register toolchains
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_toolchains()

##### rules_jvm_external setup for rules_android #####
load("@rules_jvm_external//:repositories.bzl", "rules_jvm_external_deps")
rules_jvm_external_deps()
load("@rules_jvm_external//:setup.bzl", "rules_jvm_external_setup")
rules_jvm_external_setup()

##### rules_android setup #####
load("@rules_android//:defs.bzl", "rules_android_workspace")
rules_android_workspace()

# Android SDK setup
load("@rules_android//rules:rules.bzl", "android_sdk_repository")
android_sdk_repository(
    name = "androidsdk",
)

register_toolchains(
    "@rules_android//toolchains/android:android_default_toolchain",
    "@rules_android//toolchains/android_sdk:android_sdk_tools",
)
```

## In BUILD

Load the rules from `rules_android`:

```starlark
load("@rules_android//rules:rules.bzl", "android_binary", "android_library")
android_binary(
    ...
)

android_library(
   ...
)
```

## In BUILD

Load the rules from `rules_android`:

```starlark
load("@rules_android//rules:rules.bzl", "android_binary", "android_library")
android_binary(
    ...
)

android_library(
   ...
)
```

name: v0.6.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_android", version = "0.6.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_android",
    sha256 = "af84b69ab3d16dd1a41056286e6511f147a94ccea995603e13e934c915c1631c",
    strip_prefix = "rules_android-0.6.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/releases/download/v0.6.0/rules_android-v0.6.0.tar.gz",
)

# Android rules dependencies
load("@rules_android//:prereqs.bzl", "rules_android_prereqs")
rules_android_prereqs()

##### rules_java setup for rules_android #####
load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")
rules_java_dependencies()
# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility
proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")
# register toolchains
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_toolchains()

##### rules_jvm_external setup for rules_android #####
load("@rules_jvm_external//:repositories.bzl", "rules_jvm_external_deps")
rules_jvm_external_deps()
load("@rules_jvm_external//:setup.bzl", "rules_jvm_external_setup")
rules_jvm_external_setup()

##### rules_android setup #####
load("@rules_android//:defs.bzl", "rules_android_workspace")
rules_android_workspace()

# Android SDK setup
load("@rules_android//rules:rules.bzl", "android_sdk_repository")
android_sdk_repository(
    name = "androidsdk",
)

register_toolchains(
    "@rules_android//toolchains/android:android_default_toolchain",
    "@rules_android//toolchains/android_sdk:android_sdk_tools",
)
```

## In BUILD

Load the rules from `rules_android`:

```starlark
load("@rules_android//rules:rules.bzl", "android_binary", "android_library")
android_binary(
    ...
)

android_library(
   ...
)
```
# Release notes

## Highlights:
* Compatibility with {Bazel 7, Bazel 8} x {bzlmod, WORKSPACE} x {Linux, Mac, Windows}
* Starlark implementations of all Android rules
    * Note: `android_ndk_repository` is migrated to https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android_ndk, and `android_instrumentation_test` is migrated to https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_utp
* Starlark implementations of all Android providers
* Bazel Android Tools are migrated from the Bazel repo to the rules_android repo
* `--experimental_enable_android_migration_apis` and `--experimental_google_legacy_api` are no longer required
* Fully integrated mobile-install v3 and its related tools
* Support Java 11+ compilation

## Other Changes:
* Support ANDROID_HOME paths relative to the workspace
* Generate a split APK per native architecture in fat builds.
* Updated to newer versions of rules_java, protobuf, rules_jvm_external, rules_robolectric, and others rules

name: v0.6.0-alpha1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6 or greater

1. (Bazel 6 only) Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_android", version = "0.6.0-alpha1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_android",
    sha256 = "fe3d8c4955857b44019d83d05a0b15c2a0330a6a0aab990575bb397e9570ff1b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_android-0.6.0-alpha1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/releases/download/v0.6.0-alpha1/rules_android-v0.6.0-alpha1.tar.gz",
)

# Android rules dependencies
load("@rules_android//:prereqs.bzl", "rules_android_prereqs")
rules_android_prereqs()

##### rules_java setup for rules_android #####
load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")
rules_java_dependencies()
# note that the following line is what is minimally required from protobuf for the java rules
# consider using the protobuf_deps() public API from @com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl
load("@com_google_protobuf//bazel/private:proto_bazel_features.bzl", "proto_bazel_features")  # buildifier: disable=bzl-visibility
proto_bazel_features(name = "proto_bazel_features")
# register toolchains
load("@rules_java//java:repositories.bzl", "rules_java_toolchains")
rules_java_toolchains()

##### rules_jvm_external setup for rules_android #####
load("@rules_jvm_external//:repositories.bzl", "rules_jvm_external_deps")
rules_jvm_external_deps()
load("@rules_jvm_external//:setup.bzl", "rules_jvm_external_setup")
rules_jvm_external_setup()

##### rules_android setup #####
load("@rules_android//:defs.bzl", "rules_android_workspace")
rules_android_workspace()

# Android SDK setup
load("@rules_android//rules:rules.bzl", "android_sdk_repository")
android_sdk_repository(
    name = "androidsdk",
)

register_toolchains(
    "@rules_android//toolchains/android:android_default_toolchain",
    "@rules_android//toolchains/android_sdk:android_sdk_tools",
)
```

## In BUILD

Load the rules from `rules_android`:

```starlark
load("@rules_android//rules:rules.bzl", "android_binary", "android_library")
android_binary(
    ...
)

android_library(
   ...
)
```

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_android", version = "0.5.0.bcr.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_android",
    sha256 = "fc6b022e97c2d5893aa3dd01b480f37cd386d82fc7e14edbcba393cd390a244e",
    strip_prefix = "rules_android-0.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/releases/download/v0.5.0/rules_android-v0.5.0.tar.gz",
)
load("@rules_android//:prereqs.bzl", "rules_android_prereqs")
rules_android_prereqs()
load("@rules_android//:defs.bzl", "rules_android_workspace")
rules_android_workspace()

load("@rules_android//rules:rules.bzl", "android_sdk_repository")
android_sdk_repository(
    name = "androidsdk",
)

register_toolchains(
    "@rules_android//toolchains/android:android_default_toolchain",
    "@rules_android//toolchains/android_sdk:android_sdk_tools",
)

```
## In BUILD

Load the rules from \`rules_android\`:

```starlark
load("@rules_android//rules:rules.bzl", "android_binary", "android_library")
android_binary(
    ...
)

android_library(
   ...
)
```

## What's Changed
* Clean up rules_android WORKSPACE by @ted-xie in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/55
* [SNAP FORK][UPSTREAMED] Enable support for M1 macs by @mauriciogg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/60
* Fixing CI failures by @comius in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/73
* Set visibility of merge_feature_manifests.par to public by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/79
* Add com.android.tools.build:gradle to MODULE.bazel by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/85
* Add ijwb and aswb directories to the gitignore by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/84
* Add rules_java explicitly to WORKSPACE by @ted-xie in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/88
* Pass string values to execution_requirements by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/87
* Delete accidental extra rules_java dep by @ted-xie in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/89
* Fix typos in filter_zip by @mauriciogg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/82
* Build/test more targets in BazelCI by @ted-xie in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/120
* [SNAP FORK][UPSTREAMED] Fix idl tool by @mauriciogg in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/61
* Pass min_sdk_version to R8 by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/129
* Increase R8 allowed max memory usage by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/140
* Support additional rule providers in make_rule by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/95
* Support multi platform in android_local_test unit tests by @jylinv0 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/160
* Simplify javabin path resolution by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/152
* Support passing additional toolchains to the make_rule for android_local_test by @Bencodes in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/150
* Fix reference to deps attr by @nkoroste in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/177
* Declare rules_python deps by @katre in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/175

## New Contributors
* @mauriciogg made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/60
* @Bencodes made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/79
* @jylinv0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/160
* @nkoroste made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/pull/177

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_android/commits/v0.5.0

name: v0.1.1
body: Minor bug fixes to sdk_repository and ndk_repository.

name: Initial Release
body:
Initial release of Bazel Android Skylark Rules.

Each Skylark rule is a thin wrapper around the corresponding native rule.
